name: plan_marketing_strategy
description: Plan the marketing strategy document structure before writing. Analyze the source content and create a structured plan for the document sections.

document_title.description: The title of the marketing strategy document (e.g., 'Marketing Strategy: [Product Name]')

product_name.description: The name of the product or service being marketed

target_market.description: Brief description of the primary target market (e.g., 'B2B SaaS companies, SMB segment')

sections.description: The sections to include in the marketing strategy, in order

description.description: Brief description of what this section will cover

priority.description: How critical this section is for the strategy

planning_notes.description: Any notes about the approach, assumptions, or special considerations for this marketing strategy
